revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The History of the origin, progress, and termination of the American War. By C. Stedman, who served under Sir W. Howe, Sir H. Clinton, and the Marquis Cornwallis...."
revision.text: Possibly: The History of the origin, progress, and termination of the American War. By C. Stedman, who served under Sir W. Howe, Sir H. Clinton, and the Marquis Cornwallis. In two volumes. (Charles Stedman). (London : Printed for the author; and sold by J. Murray, Fleet-Street; J. Debrett, Picadilly; and J. Kerby, corner of Wigmore-Street, Cavendish-Square, 1794). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2035946~S1
